snippet: The longtime director of the State Pushkin Museum of Fine Arts is stepping down, weeks after trying to involve President Vladimir V. Putin in a dispute with the Hermitage.
abstract: Irina Antonova, longtime director of the State Pushkin Museum of Fine Arts is stepping down, weeks after trying to involve President Vladimir V Putin in dispute with State Hermitage Museum in St Petersburg over works by Matisse, Picasso and other Modern masters.
lead_paragraph: The longtime director of the State Pushkin Museum of Fine Arts is stepping down, weeks after trying to involve President Vladimir V. Putin in a dispute with the Hermitage.

headline.seo: Pushkin Director Departs After Bid for President’s Support
headline.main: A Russian Museum Feud With Putin in the Middle
headline.print_headline: A Russian Museum Feud With Putin in the Middle
